org.kynosarges.tektosyne.subdivision

Interface SubdivisionFullMap<T,U,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of all objects mapped to Subdivision.faces()
    U - the type of all objects mapped to Subdivision.edges()
    V - the type of all objects mapped to Subdivision.vertices()
    All Superinterfaces:
    SubdivisionMap<T>

    public interface SubdivisionFullMap<T,U,V>
extends SubdivisionMap<T>
    Maps all elements of a planar Subdivision to arbitrary objects. Provides an application-specific mapping of all Subdivision.faces(), Subdivision.edges(), and Subdivision.vertices() of a planar Subdivision to arbitrary objects.

    All conversion methods have a default implementation that throws UnsupportedOperationException so that clients may selectively implement actual conversion methods for any desired element types.

    Since the Subdivision has no knowledge of any SubdivisionFullMap instances that reference it, clients must manually update any such instances whenever the underlying Subdivision changes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default U fromEdge(SubdivisionEdge edge)
      Converts the specified SubdivisionEdge into the associated U instance.
      default V fromVertex(PointD vertex)
      Converts the specified PointD vertex into the associated V instance.
      default SubdivisionEdge toEdge(U value)
      Converts the specified U instance into the associated SubdivisionEdge.
      default PointD toVertex(V value)
      Converts the specified V instance into the associated PointD vertex.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.kynosarges.tektosyne.subdivision.SubdivisionMap

        fromFace, source, target, toFace

      • fromEdge

        default U fromEdge(SubdivisionEdge edge)
        Converts the specified SubdivisionEdge into the associated U instance.
        Parameters:
        edge - the SubdivisionEdge to convert
        Returns:
        the U instance associated with edge
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if SubdivisionMap.source() does not contain edge
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if not overridden by an implementing class
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if edge is null

      • toEdge

        default SubdivisionEdge toEdge(U value)
        Converts the specified U instance into the associated SubdivisionEdge.
        Parameters:
        value - the U instance to convert
        Returns:
        the SubdivisionEdge associated with value
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if value does not map to any SubdivisionEdge within SubdivisionMap.source()
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if not overridden by an implementing class
